alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western La Salle and Webb Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Millett to near La Esperanza Ranch Airport to 15 miles southeast of Rio Bravo. Movement was northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Cotulla, Encinal, Rio Bravo, El Cenizo, Ranchos Penitas West, Columbia Bridge, United South High School, Artesia Wells, Gardendale, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Callaghan, Texas A&M, Las Tiendas, Laredo International Airport, Botines, Unitec Industrial Park, La Esperanza Ranch Airport, Ranchitos Las Lomas and Woodward. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 82. US Highway 59 between mile markers 808 and 824. US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 734. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
